name: Kevin CHAPPELL, Warden, petitioner, v. Hector AYALA.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Kevin CHAPPELL, Warden, petitioner,
v.
Hector AYALA.

opinions.text: Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit granted. In addition to the question presented by the petition, the parties are directed to brief and argue the following question: "Whether the court of appeals properly applied the standard articulated in Brecht v. Abrahamson,507 U.S. 619, 113 S.Ct. 1710, 123 L.Ed.2d 353 (1993)."

casebody.head_matter:
Kevin CHAPPELL, Warden, petitioner,
v.
Hector AYALA.
No. 13-1428.
Supreme Court of the United States
Oct. 20, 2014.
Opinion
